name: $prefix
desc: Returns: A user-visible prefix for the action.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A user-visible prefix for the action.

name: $title
desc: Returns: The title of the action displayed to a user.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The title of the action displayed to a user.

name: $description
desc: Returns: A brief description of the action used to provide a summary to display to the user.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A brief description of the action used to provide a summary to display to the user.

name: $textEquivalent
desc: Returns: A text equivalent of the action to be performed. This provides a human-interpretable description of the action when the definition is consumed by a system that might not be capable of interpreting it dynamically.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A text equivalent of the action to be performed. This provides a human-interpretable description of the action when the definition is consumed by a system that might not be capable of interpreting it dynamically.

name: $priority
desc: Returns: Indicates how quickly the action should be addressed with respect to other actions.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Indicates how quickly the action should be addressed with respect to other actions.

name: $code
desc: Returns: A code that provides meaning for the action or action group. For example, a section may have a LOINC code for the section of a documentation template.

name: $addcode
desc: A code that provides meaning for the action or action group. For example, a section may have a LOINC code for the section of a documentation template.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A code that provides meaning for the action or action group. For example, a section may have a LOINC code for the section of a documentation template.

name: $reason
desc: Returns: A description of why this action is necessary or appropriate.

name: $addreason
desc: A description of why this action is necessary or appropriate.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A description of why this action is necessary or appropriate.

name: $documentation
desc: Returns: Didactic or other informational resources associated with the action that can be provided to the CDS recipient. Information resources can include inline text commentary and links to web resources.

name: $adddocumentation
desc: Didactic or other informational resources associated with the action that can be provided to the CDS recipient. Information resources can include inline text commentary and links to web resources.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Didactic or other informational resources associated with the action that can be provided to the CDS recipient. Information resources can include inline text commentary and links to web resources.

name: $goalId
desc: Returns: Identifies goals that this action supports. The reference must be to a goal element defined within this plan definition.

name: $addgoalId
desc: Identifies goals that this action supports. The reference must be to a goal element defined within this plan definition.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Identifies goals that this action supports. The reference must be to a goal element defined within this plan definition.

name: $trigger
desc: Returns: A description of when the action should be triggered.

name: $addtrigger
desc: A description of when the action should be triggered.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A description of when the action should be triggered.

name: $condition
desc: Returns: An expression that describes applicability criteria or start/stop conditions for the action.

name: $addcondition
desc: An expression that describes applicability criteria or start/stop conditions for the action.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: An expression that describes applicability criteria or start/stop conditions for the action.

name: $input
desc: Returns: Defines input data requirements for the action.

name: $addinput
desc: Defines input data requirements for the action.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Defines input data requirements for the action.

name: $output
desc: Returns: Defines the outputs of the action, if any.

name: $addoutput
desc: Defines the outputs of the action, if any.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Defines the outputs of the action, if any.

name: $relatedAction
desc: Returns: A relationship to another action such as "before" or "30-60 minutes after start of".

name: $addrelatedAction
desc: A relationship to another action such as "before" or "30-60 minutes after start of".

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A relationship to another action such as "before" or "30-60 minutes after start of".

name: $participant
desc: Returns: Indicates who should participate in performing the action described.

name: $addparticipant
desc: Indicates who should participate in performing the action described.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Indicates who should participate in performing the action described.

name: $::type
desc: Returns: The type of action to perform (create, update, remove).

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The type of action to perform (create, update, remove).

name: $groupingBehavior
desc: Returns: Defines the grouping behavior for the action and its children.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Defines the grouping behavior for the action and its children.

name: $selectionBehavior
desc: Returns: Defines the selection behavior for the action and its children.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Defines the selection behavior for the action and its children.

name: $requiredBehavior
desc: Returns: Defines the required behavior for the action.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Defines the required behavior for the action.

name: $precheckBehavior
desc: Returns: Defines whether the action should usually be preselected.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Defines whether the action should usually be preselected.

name: $cardinalityBehavior
desc: Returns: Defines whether the action can be selected multiple times.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Defines whether the action can be selected multiple times.

name: $transform
desc: Returns: A reference to a StructureMap resource that defines a transform that can be executed to produce the intent resource using the ActivityDefinition instance as the input.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A reference to a StructureMap resource that defines a transform that can be executed to produce the intent resource using the ActivityDefinition instance as the input.

name: $dynamicValue
desc: Returns: Customizations that should be applied to the statically defined resource. For example, if the dosage of a medication must be computed based on the patient's weight, a customization would be used to specify an expression that calculated the weight, and the path on the resource that would contain the result.

name: $adddynamicValue
desc: Customizations that should be applied to the statically defined resource. For example, if the dosage of a medication must be computed based on the patient's weight, a customization would be used to specify an expression that calculated the weight, and the path on the resource that would contain the result.

lvardefs.name: objRef
